summary: MCoreNevaModel merges the Neva multimodal base model with the Megatron‑core GPT implementation, delivering a unified model that supports the MCore GPT architecture for multimodal tasks. It handles model construction, forward computation, and optional freezing of the language‑model parameters.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use multimodal AI component that leverages the high‑performance Megatron GPT core, enabling developers to incorporate advanced language and vision capabilities into products such as virtual assistants, content generation tools, or AI‑enhanced applications.
